welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pekalongan, known as the "Batik City" for its rich tradition of batik art and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy exploring our charming city and all it has to offer. Have a wonderful time here!

restaurants.name: RM Bung Kombor
restaurants.description: RM Bung Kombor is a indonesian restaurant located in Pekalongan.
restaurants.address: Jalan Blimbing No. 134, Pekalongan, Jawa Tengah

restaurants.name: Pawon Mbok'e
restaurants.description: Pawon Mbok'e is a indonesian restaurant located in Pekalongan.

restaurants.description: Soto Tauto pak Kunawi is a asian restaurant located in Pekalongan.
restaurants.address: jalan Teratai (Klego V), Pekalongan, Jawa Tengah

restaurants.name: Purimas 3
